page.title: 2011 Space Elevator Conference Call for Papers

snippet.s: Call for Papers. Abstracts must be in English, one page or less, and summarize a presentation suitable for the conference. For all submittals, please include the

text.s: August 12-14 | Microsoft Conference Center | Redmond, Washington, USA

Abstracts must be in English, one page or less, and summarize a presentation suitable for the conference. For all submittals, please include the title, authors and affiliations, mail address, e-mail, and phone number of the corresponding author, and up to 10 key words. Abstracts are due by July 1, 2011. Authors will be notified of acceptance by July 8th, 2011 or earlier. Final drafts of the presentations in PowerPoint or PDF formats will be due before the conference on July 29, 2011.

We will collect all presentations made and include them in the conference proceedings, to be offered for sale on digital media after the conference. By submitting a presentation to the conference, the author(s) explicitly gives the Space Elevator Conference organizing committee the right to include their presentation in these proceedings. In addition, the author(s) are expected to submit a supporting paper which will also be included in the proceedings, the deadline for which is August 29, 2011.
Submit your abstracts and papers to the online Conference Management Tool (CMT).
Abstracts, papers, and technical program inquiries to:
